metadata.title: CVE-2018-10790 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The AP4_CttsAtom class in Core/Ap4CttsAtom.cpp in Bento4 1.5.1.0 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash), relatedto a memory allocation failure, as demonstrated by mp2aac.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
